sourceMeaningMnemonic: The sun hits this and breaks into three <radical>sun</radical>s. What can split the sun in three directions? A <kanji>crystal</kanji>!
meaningInfo: Crystals take light and refract it around into many directions. That's why there are three suns in this kanji.
readingMnemonic: Who is hoarding and harnessing the power of these <kanji>crystal</kanji>s? That would be the <reading>Shou</reading>gun (<ja>しょう</ja>).
readingInfo: Imagine the Shougun lying in his bed of crystals. He still has his really serious, angry face though. Even as he rubs the crystals to his face, he's glowering.
